title: THE WITCHER Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: 🎵 Toss a coin to your Witcher 🎵 Let me know what you thought of this first season below!

As someone who never read the books or played the games, I find the timeline perfectly understandable. In fact, I love that it waits until episode 4 to reveal that events aren't happening at the same time, and that it doesn't spell that out for the viewer. The show respects the intelligence of its viewership and I deeply appreciate that.
I never played the games or read the books so realizing there were more than one timeline going on took a few episodes for me. I still really liked the season even going in cold.
Who else has had "Toss a coin to your witcher" stuck in their head for a week straight?

actually there are 3 timelines.
1. yennefers timeline (origin of her)
2. geralts timeline (when he's in blaviken)
3. ciris timeline.
description:
In this video we breakdown and explain the ending to season 1 of Netflix's "The Witcher" based off the fantasy novels by Andrzej Sapkowski. We'll review and recap important parts of the season including the timeline and the relationship between Geralt, Yennefer, and Ciri.
